akn:section.akn:heading: Assistance for providers of transportation services affected by COVID–19

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Funding Out of any funds in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, there are appropriated to provide grants to eligible providers of transportation services under this section, $2,000,000,000 for fiscal year 2021, to remain available until expended.
